data.actual_result: Last Friend gets cut out, and you cannot scroll down to click on the last friend.
data.expected_result: You should be able to see your last friend in the list.
data.short_description: Bottom of your Friend List gets cut out when you are in VC.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get in a VC - Go to Friends List - Scroll all the way down to your last friend.
